alert.note: Alert for Archer; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 11:36AM CDT until June 23 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ARCHER AND SOUTHEASTERN WICHITA COUNTIES... At 1135 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holliday, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail 3 miles southeast of Kamay. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Iowa Park, Holliday, Scotland, Windthorst, southwestern Lake Arrowhead, Lakeside City, and Pleasant Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
